column4: If I have a 100 KB/s download cap on Transmission, why does System Monitor report that I'm downloading at my maximum speed? Nothing else should be downloading, and when I quit Transmission, the graph shows continued maximum downloading for a minute, then it crashes to 0.
Do I have some wacky form of malware that attaches itself to a BitTorrent client and only downloads when said client is running?
So? System Monitor is set to report in KB/s, not Kb/s
